mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_NO, COMPANY_IMG, COMPANY_CITY, COMPANY_SORT FROM COMPANY ORDER BY COMPANY_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY (COMPANY_NO, COMPANY_NAME, MEMBER_NO, COMPANY_SORT, COMPANY_CONTENT, COMPANY_TEL, COMPANY_NUMBER, COMPANY_IMG, COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_CITY) VALUES(COMPANY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{company_name}, #{member_no}, #{company_sort}, #{company_content}, #{company_tel}, #{company_number}, #{company_img}, #{company_addr} , #{company_city})
mapper.select: SELECT COM.COMPANY_NO, COMPANY_IMG, COMPANY_PRODUCT, COMPANY_MONEY FROM COMPANY COM INNER JOIN COMPANY_PRICE PRICE ON COM.COMPANY_NO=PRICE.COMPANY_NO
SELECT COM.COMPANY_NO, COM.COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_IMG, COMPANY_PRODUCT, COMPANY_MONEY FROM COMPANY COM INNER JOIN COMPANY_PRICE PRICE ON COM.COMPANY_NO=PRICE.COMPANY_NO WHERE COMPANY_SORT='숙소'
SELECT COM.COMPANY_NO, COM.COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_IMG, COMPANY_PRODUCT, COMPANY_MONEY FROM COMPANY COM INNER JOIN COMPANY_PRICE PRICE ON COM.COMPANY_NO=PRICE.COMPANY_NO WHERE COMPANY_SORT='음식점'
SELECT COM.COMPANY_NO, COM.COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_IMG, COMPANY_PRODUCT, COMPANY_MONEY FROM COMPANY COM INNER JOIN COMPANY_PRICE PRICE ON COM.COMPANY_NO=PRICE.COMPANY_NO WHERE COMPANY_SORT='관광지'

SELECT COM.COMPANY_NO, COM.COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_IMG, COMPANY_PRODUCT, COMPANY_MONEY FROM COMPANY COM INNER JOIN COMPANY_PRICE PRICE ON COM.COMPANY_NO=PRICE.COMPANY_NO WHERE COM.COMPANY_NO=(SELECT COMPANY_NO FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{member_no})
